resources.string: Welcome to ScienceApp. Your calls and SMS will be logged by default only starting this app. In order to modify any of the options, just click in the button above called "Preferences". Your actions will be logged as long as the app is running in your device.

string.name: splashText
string.p: ScienceApp is an Android OS, built as graduation project application for the MSc in Media Technology from the University of Leiden (http://mediatechnology.leiden.edu/)

This app helps scientists to manage the users of their experiments by means of logging calls, sms and location of these users, so the researchers can later withdraw conclusions in an easier way from the data and information gathered.

In order to start the application, you have to press the button ACCEPT, agreeing on that your personal data such as SMS, telephone calls and your geospatial position will be tracked and sent to a remote DB server for scientific purposes.
